attributes.action: Review the law which currently prevents builders recovering their installed materials  except through civil  action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned are seeking a change in the law to enable builders to recover their goods under criminal law in exactly the same way that shopkeepers can. Thousands of builders and allied trades are forced into bankruptcy every year through customers failing to pay for labour and materials. The protection given to the consumer creates an unequal contract between the two parties and is exploited by many 'cowboy customers' who have work carried out without the slightest intention of paying.
